EmailTemplate.name: Case Creation Acknowledgement Template 3
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Technical Support. Your case and reference numbers are provided in the subject line above. To communicate with us about this inquiry, please reply to this e-mail with these numbers in the message subject line.
Based upon complexity, resolution can take 24 hours or longer. For more immediate support in identifying a solution, visit our convenient Technical Knowledge Center support database on the www.MyAerospace.com portal or call us at the numbers below.
Through www.MyAerospace.com, you can open and track your case status, find solutions to common technical issues, view technical publications, obtain real-time pricing and availability, and place orders.
Thank you, we appreciate your business.
Honeywell Aerospace Technical Support
Contact Technical Support:
Web: www.myaerospace.com
Phone: 1-855-808-6500 or internationally at 1-602-365-6500 (international direct dial - click here for in-country numbers)
Email: Aerotechsupport@Honeywell.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE:
{!Case.Subject}
{!Case.Description}
{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
